verses.verse: וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer spake יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> Yah-weh that the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to מֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh, unto Moses וְאֶ֧ל <WH413> ve-'El and to אֶלְעָזָ֛ר <WH499> 'el-'a-Zar and unto Eleazar בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son אַהֲרֹ֥ן <WH175> 'a-ha-Ron of Aaron הַכֹּהֵ֖ן <WH3548> hak-ko-Hen the priest לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> le-Mor. saying

שְׂא֞וּ <WH5375> se-'U Take אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- רֹ֣אשׁ׀ <WH7218> rosh the sum כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- of all עֲדַ֣ת <WH5712> 'a-Dat of all the congregation בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> be-nei- of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel מִבֶּ֨ן <WH1121> mib-Ben old עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> 'es-Rim from twenty שָׁנָ֛ה <WH8141> sha-Nah years וָמַ֖עְלָה <WH4605> va-Ma'-lah and upward לְבֵ֣ית <WH1004> le-Veit house אֲבֹתָ֑ם <WH1> 'a-vo-Tam; throughout their fathers' כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- whoever יֹצֵ֥א <WH3318> yo-Tze all that are able to go צָבָ֖א <WH6635> tza-Va to war בְּיִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> be-Yis-ra-'El. in Israel

וַיְדַבֵּ֨ר <WH1696> vay-dab-Ber spake מֹשֶׁ֜ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh And Moses וְאֶלְעָזָ֧ר <WH499> ve-'el-'a-Zar and Eleazar הַכֹּהֵ֛ן <WH3548> hak-ko-Hen the priest אֹתָ֖ם <WH854> 'o-Tam in בְּעַֽרְבֹ֣ת <WH6160> be-'ar-Vot with them in the plains מוֹאָ֑ב <WH4124> mo-'Av; of Moab עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- by יַרְדֵּ֥ן <WH3383> yar-Den by Jordan יְרֵח֖וֹ <WH3405> ye-re-Cho [near] Jericho לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> le-Mor. saying

מִבֶּ֛ן <WH1121> mib-Ben old עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> 'es-Rim [Take the sum of the people] from twenty שָׁנָ֖ה <WH8141> sha-Nah years וָמָ֑עְלָה <WH4605> va-Ma-'e-lah; and upward כַּאֲשֶׁר֩ <WH834> ka-'a-Sher after צִוָּ֨ה <WH6680> tziv-Vah commanded יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> Yah-weh as the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- מֹשֶׁה֙ <WH4872> mo-Sheh Moses וּבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> u-ve-Nei and the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel הַיֹּצְאִ֖ים <WH3318> hai-yo-tze-'Im which went forth מֵאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> me-'E-retz out of the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> mitz-Ra-yim. of Egypt

רְאוּבֵ֖ן <WH7205> re-'u-Ven Reuben בְּכ֣וֹר <WH1060> be-Chor the eldest יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El; son of Israel בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei the children רְאוּבֵ֗ן <WH7205> re-'u-Ven, of Reuben חֲנוֹךְ֙ <WH2585> cha-noCh Hanoch מִשְׁפַּ֣חַת <WH4940> mish-Pa-chat [of whom cometh] the family הַחֲנֹכִ֔י <WH2599> ha-cha-no-Chi, of the Hanochites לְפַלּ֕וּא <WH6396> le-fal-Lu of Pallu מִשְׁפַּ֖חַת <WH4940> mish-Pa-chat the family הַפַּלֻּאִֽי׃ <WH6384> hap-pal-lu-'I. of the Palluites

לְחֶצְרֹ֕ן <WH2696> le-chetz-Ron Of Hezron מִשְׁפַּ֖חַת <WH4940> mish-Pa-chat the family הַֽחֶצְרוֹנִ֑י <WH2697> ha-chetz-ro-Ni; of the Hezronites לְכַרְמִ֕י <WH3756> le-char-Mi of Carmi מִשְׁפַּ֖חַת <WH4940> mish-Pa-chat the family הַכַּרְמִֽי׃ <WH3757> hak-kar-Mi. of the Carmites

אֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> 'El-leh These מִשְׁפְּחֹ֣ת <WH4940> mish-pe-Chot These [are] the families הָרֻֽאוּבֵנִ֑י <WH7206> ha-ru-'u-ve-Ni; of the Reubenites וַיִּהְי֣וּ <WH1961> vai-yih-Yu become פְקֻדֵיהֶ֗ם <WH6485> fe-ku-dei-Hem, and they that were numbered שְׁלֹשָׁ֤ה <WH7969> she-lo-Shah and three וְאַרְבָּעִים֙ <WH705> ve-'ar-ba-'Im of them were forty אֶ֔לֶף <WH505> 'E-lef, thousand וּשְׁבַ֥ע <WH7651> u-she-Va' and seven מֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> me-'ot hundred וּשְׁלֹשִֽׁים׃ <WH7970> u-she-lo-Shim. and thirty
וּבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> u-ve-Nei And the sons פַלּ֖וּא <WH6396> fal-Lu of Pallu אֱלִיאָֽב׃ <WH446> 'e-li-'Av. Eliab

וּבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> u-ve-Nei And the sons אֱלִיאָ֔ב <WH446> 'e-li-'Av, of Eliab נְמוּאֵ֖ל <WH5241> ne-mu-'El Nemuel וְדָתָ֣ן <WH1885> ve-da-Tan and Dathan וַאֲבִירָ֑ם <WH48> va-'a-vi-Ram; and Abiram הֽוּא־ <WH1931> hu- These דָתָ֨ן <WH1885> da-Tan This [is that] Dathan וַאֲבִירָ֜ם <WH48> va-'a-vi-Ram and Abiram; קְרוּאֵי ke-ru-'ei כקְרִיאֵ֣י <WH7148> ke-ri-'Ei famous קהָעֵדָ֗ה <WH5712> ha-'e-Dah, in the congregation אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> 'a-Sher who הִצּ֜וּ <WH5327> hitz-Tzu who strove עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- against מֹשֶׁ֤ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh against Moses וְעַֽל־ <WH5921> ve-'al- and against אַהֲרֹן֙ <WH175> 'a-ha-Ron and against Aaron בַּעֲדַת־ <WH5712> ba-'a-dat- in the company קֹ֔רַח <WH7141> Ko-rach, of Korah בְּהַצֹּתָ֖ם <WH5327> be-hatz-tzo-Tam when they strove עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- against יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. against the LORD

וַתִּפְתַּ֨ח <WH6605> vat-tif-Tach opened הָאָ֜רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz And the earth אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- פִּ֗יהָ <WH6310> Pi-ha, her mouth וַתִּבְלַ֥ע <WH1104> vat-tiv-La' and swallowed them up אֹתָ֛ם <WH853> 'o-Tam וְאֶת־ <WH854> ve-'Et with קֹ֖רַח <WH7141> Ko-rach together with Korah בְּמ֣וֹת <WH4194> be-Mot died הָעֵדָ֑ה <WH5712> ha-'e-Dah; when that company בַּאֲכֹ֣ל <WH398> ba-'a-Chol devoured הָאֵ֗שׁ <WH784> ha-'Esh, what time the fire אֵ֣ת <WH853> 'et חֲמִשִּׁ֤ים <WH2572> cha-mish-Shim and fifty וּמָאתַ֙יִם֙ <WH3967> u-ma-Ta-yim two hundred אִ֔ישׁ <WH376> 'Ish, men וַיִּהְי֖וּ <WH1961> vai-yih-Yu became לְנֵֽס׃ <WH5251> le-Nes. and they became a sign
וּבְנֵי־ <WH1121> u-ve-nei- Notwithstanding the children קֹ֖רַח <WH7141> Ko-rach of Korah לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- did not מֵֽתוּ׃ <WH4191> Me-tu. died ס sa-Mek

בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei The sons שִׁמְעוֹן֮ <WH8095> shim-'On of Simeon לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָם֒ <WH4940> le-mish-pe-cho-Tam after their families לִנְמוּאֵ֗ל <WH5241> lin-mu-'El, of Nemuel מִשְׁפַּ֙חַת֙ <WH4940> mish-Pa-chat the family הַנְּמ֣וּאֵלִ֔י <WH5242> han-ne-Mu-'e-Li, of the Nemuelites לְיָמִ֕ין <WH3226> le-ya-Min of Jamin מִשְׁפַּ֖חַת <WH4940> mish-Pa-chat the family הַיָּמִינִ֑י <WH3228> hai-ya-mi-Ni; of the Jaminites לְיָכִ֕ין <WH3199> le-ya-Chin of Jachin מִשְׁפַּ֖חַת <WH4940> mish-Pa-chat the family הַיָּכִינִֽי׃ <WH3200> hai-ya-chi-Ni. of the Jachinites

לְזֶ֕רַח <WH2226> le-Ze-rach Of Zerah מִשְׁפַּ֖חַת <WH4940> mish-Pa-chat the family הַזַּרְחִ֑י <WH2227> haz-zar-Chi; of the Zarhites לְשָׁא֕וּל <WH7586> le-sha-'Ul of Shaul מִשְׁפַּ֖חַת <WH4940> mish-Pa-chat the family הַשָּׁאוּלִֽי׃ <WH7587> hash-sha-'u-Li. of the Shaulites

אֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> 'El-leh These מִשְׁפְּחֹ֣ת <WH4940> mish-pe-Chot These [are] the families הַשִּׁמְעֹנִ֑י <WH8099> hash-shim-'o-Ni; of the Simeonites שְׁנַ֧יִם <WH8147> she-Na-yim and two וְעֶשְׂרִ֛ים <WH6242> ve-'es-Rim twenty אֶ֖לֶף <WH505> 'E-lef thousand וּמָאתָֽיִם׃ <WH3967> u-ma-Ta-yim. and two hundred ס sa-Mek

בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei The children גָד֮ <WH1410> gad of Gad לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָם֒ <WH4940> le-mish-pe-cho-Tam after their families לִצְפ֗וֹן <WH6827> litz-Fon, of Zephon מִשְׁפַּ֙חַת֙ <WH4940> mish-Pa-chat the family הַצְּפוֹנִ֔י <WH6831> hatz-tze-fo-Ni, of the Zephonites לְחַגִּ֕י <WH2291> le-chag-Gi of Haggi מִשְׁפַּ֖חַת <WH4940> mish-Pa-chat the family הַֽחַגִּ֑י <WH2291> ha-chag-Gi; of the Haggites לְשׁוּנִ֕י <WH7764> le-shu-Ni of Shuni מִשְׁפַּ֖חַת <WH4940> mish-Pa-chat the family הַשּׁוּנִֽי׃ <WH7765> hash-shu-Ni. of the Shunites

לְאָזְנִ֕י <WH244> le-'a-ze-Ni Of Ozni מִשְׁפַּ֖חַת <WH4940> mish-Pa-chat the family הָאָזְנִ֑י <WH244> ha-'a-ze-Ni; of the Oznites לְעֵרִ֕י <WH6179> le-'e-Ri of Eri מִשְׁפַּ֖חַת <WH4940> mish-Pa-chat the family הָעֵרִֽי׃ <WH6180> ha-'e-Ri. of the Erites

לַאֲר֕וֹד <WH720> la-'a-Rod Of Arod מִשְׁפַּ֖חַת <WH4940> mish-Pa-chat the family הָאֲרוֹדִ֑י <WH722> ha-'a-ro-Di; of the Arodites לְאַ֨רְאֵלִ֔י <WH692> le-'Ar-'e-Li, of Areli מִשְׁפַּ֖חַת <WH4940> mish-Pa-chat the family הָאַרְאֵלִֽי׃ <WH692> ha-'ar-'e-Li. of the Arelites

אֵ֛לֶּה <WH428> 'El-leh These מִשְׁפְּחֹ֥ת <WH4940> mish-pe-Chot These [are] the families בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> be-nei- of the children גָ֖ד <WH1410> gad of Gad לִפְקֻדֵיהֶ֑ם <WH6485> lif-ku-dei-Hem; according to those that were numbered אַרְבָּעִ֥ים <WH705> 'ar-ba-'Im of them forty אֶ֖לֶף <WH505> 'E-lef thousand וַחֲמֵ֥שׁ <WH2568> va-cha-Mesh and five מֵאֽוֹת׃ <WH3967> me-'ot. hundred ס sa-Mek

בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> be-Nei The sons יְהוּדָ֖ה <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah of Judah עֵ֣ר <WH6147> 'er [were] Er וְאוֹנָ֑ן <WH209> ve-'o-Nan; and Onan וַיָּ֥מָת <WH4191> vai-Ya-mot died עֵ֛ר <WH6147> 'er and Er וְאוֹנָ֖ן <WH209> ve-'o-Nan and Onan בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> be-'E-retz in the land כְּנָֽעַן׃ <WH3667> ke-Na-'an. of Canaan

וַיִּהְי֣וּ <WH1961> vai-yih-Yu become בְנֵי־ <WH1121> ve-nei- And the sons יְהוּדָה֮ <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah of Judah לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָם֒ <WH4940> le-mish-pe-cho-Tam after their families לְשֵׁלָ֗ה <WH7956> le-she-Lah, were of Shelah מִשְׁפַּ֙חַת֙ <WH4940> mish-Pa-chat the family הַשֵּׁ֣לָנִ֔י <WH8024> hash-She-la-Ni, of the Shelanites לְפֶ֕רֶץ <WH6557> le-Fe-retz of Pharez מִשְׁפַּ֖חַת <WH4940> mish-Pa-chat the family הַפַּרְצִ֑י <WH6558> hap-par-Tzi; of the Pharzites לְזֶ֕רַח <WH2226> le-Ze-rach of Zerah מִשְׁפַּ֖חַת <WH4940> mish-Pa-chat the family הַזַּרְחִֽי׃ <WH2227> haz-zar-Chi. of the Zarhites

וַיִּהְי֣וּ <WH1961> vai-yih-Yu become בְנֵי־ <WH1121> ve-nei- And the sons פֶ֔רֶץ <WH6557> Fe-retz, of Pharez לְחֶצְרֹ֕ן <WH2696> le-chetz-Ron were of Hezron מִשְׁפַּ֖חַת <WH4940> mish-Pa-chat the family הַֽחֶצְרֹנִ֑י <WH2697> ha-chetz-ro-Ni; of the Hezronites לְחָמ֕וּל <WH2538> le-cha-Mul of Hamul מִשְׁפַּ֖חַת <WH4940> mish-Pa-chat the family הֶחָמוּלִֽי׃ <WH2539> he-cha-mu-Li. of the Hamulites

אֵ֛לֶּה <WH428> 'El-leh These מִשְׁפְּחֹ֥ת <WH4940> mish-pe-Chot These [are] the families יְהוּדָ֖ה <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah of Judah לִפְקֻדֵיהֶ֑ם <WH6485> lif-ku-dei-Hem; according to those that were numbered שִׁשָּׁ֧ה <WH8337> shish-Shah six וְשִׁבְעִ֛ים <WH7657> ve-shiv-'Im seventy אֶ֖לֶף <WH505> 'E-lef thousand וַחֲמֵ֥שׁ <WH2568> va-cha-Mesh and five מֵאֽוֹת׃ <WH3967> me-'ot. hundred ס sa-Mek

בְּנֵ֤י <WH1121> be-Nei [Of] the sons יִשָּׂשכָר֙ <WH3485> yis-sa-sh-Char of Issachar לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָ֔ם <WH4940> le-mish-pe-cho-Tam, after their families תּוֹלָ֕ע <WH8439> to-La' [of] Tola מִשְׁפַּ֖חַת <WH4940> mish-Pa-chat the family הַתּוֹלָעִ֑י <WH8440> hat-to-la-'I; of the Tolaites לְפֻוָ֕ה <WH6312> le-fu-Vah of Pua מִשְׁפַּ֖חַת <WH4940> mish-Pa-chat the family הַפּוּנִֽי׃ <WH6324> hap-pu-Ni. of the Punites

לְיָשׁ֕וּב <WH3437> le-ya-Shuv Of Jashub מִשְׁפַּ֖חַת <WH4940> mish-Pa-chat the family הַיָּשׁוּבִ֑י <WH3432> hai-ya-shu-Vi; of the Jashubites לְשִׁמְרֹ֕ן <WH8110> le-shim-Ron of Shimron מִשְׁפַּ֖חַת <WH4940> mish-Pa-chat the family הַשִּׁמְרֹנִֽי׃ <WH8117> hash-shim-ro-Ni. of the Shimronites

אֵ֛לֶּה <WH428> 'El-leh These מִשְׁפְּחֹ֥ת <WH4940> mish-pe-Chot These [are] the families יִשָּׂשכָ֖ר <WH3485> yis-so-sh-Char of Issachar לִפְקֻדֵיהֶ֑ם <WH6485> lif-ku-dei-Hem; according to those that were numbered אַרְבָּעָ֧ה <WH702> 'ar-ba-'Ah and four וְשִׁשִּׁ֛ים <WH8346> ve-shish-Shim of them threescore אֶ֖לֶף <WH505> 'E-lef thousand וּשְׁלֹ֥שׁ <WH7969> u-she-Losh and three מֵאֽוֹת׃ <WH3967> me-'ot. hundred ס sa-Mek

בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei [Of] the sons זְבוּלֻן֮ <WH2074> ze-vu-Lun of Zebulun לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָם֒ <WH4940> le-mish-pe-cho-Tam after their families לְסֶ֗רֶד <WH5624> le-Se-red, of Sered מִשְׁפַּ֙חַת֙ <WH4940> mish-Pa-chat the family הַסַּרְדִּ֔י <WH5625> has-sar-Di, of the Sardites לְאֵל֕וֹן <WH356> le-'e-Lon of Elon מִשְׁפַּ֖חַת <WH4940> mish-Pa-chat the family הָאֵלֹנִ֑י <WH440> ha-'e-lo-Ni; of the Elonites לְיַ֨חְלְאֵ֔ל <WH3177> le-Yach-le-'El, of Jahleel מִשְׁפַּ֖חַת <WH4940> mish-Pa-chat the family הַיַּחְלְאֵלִֽי׃ <WH3178> hai-yach-le-'e-Li. of the Jahleelites

אֵ֛לֶּה <WH428> 'El-leh These מִשְׁפְּחֹ֥ת <WH4940> mish-pe-Chot These [are] the families הַזְּבוּלֹנִ֖י <WH2075> haz-ze-vu-lo-Ni of the Zebulunites לִפְקֻדֵיהֶ֑ם <WH6485> lif-ku-dei-Hem; according to those that were numbered שִׁשִּׁ֥ים <WH8346> shish-Shim of them threescore אֶ֖לֶף <WH505> 'E-lef thousand וַחֲמֵ֥שׁ <WH2568> va-cha-Mesh and five מֵאֽוֹת׃ <WH3967> me-'ot. hundred ס sa-Mek

בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> be-Nei The sons יוֹסֵ֖ף <WH3130> yo-Sef of Joseph לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָ֑ם <WH4940> le-mish-pe-cho-Tam; after their families מְנַשֶּׁ֖ה <WH4519> me-nash-Sheh [were] Manasseh וְאֶפְרָֽיִם׃ <WH669> ve-'ef-Ra-yim. and Ephraim
